ygData.msgSnippet: Where are the ruins located, I guess in relation to the crossroads of Butcherblock? ... _________________________________________________________ Do You
ygData.messageBody:
Where are the ruins located, I guess in relation to the crossroads of
Butcherblock?

--- GAMSTR@... wrote:
> From: GAMSTR@...
>
> You should also be to the point where you can take
> on skeletons over at the
> ruins in butcher block... especialy if you have ward
> undead. At worst, you
> should be able to team with one other person and be
> able to take them out. I
> spent time vanquishing the undead there from levels
> 6 to 9.
>
> Krul (16th Cleric hailing from the age of beta)
>
